[[File:The Tolkien Experience Podcast.jpg|right|250px]] '''The Tolkien Experience''' is a two-fold project by Luke Shelton, that encompases the '''Tolkien Experience Project''' and '''Podcast''', both focused on collecting the experiences by fans and scholars. ==Tolkien Experience Project== "It is an attempt to catalogue the experience of different Tolkien fans and share them in a public forum to grow community around Tolkien's work!"{{webcite|author=Luke Shelton|articleurl=https://luke-shelton.com/tolkien-experience-project/|articlename=Tolkien Experience Project|website=[https://luke-shelton.com/ luke-shelton.com]|accessed=18 May 2023}} Fans who wish to participate must answer five questions: #How were you introduced to Tolkien's work? #What is your favorite part of Tolkien's work? #What is your fondest experience of Tolkien's work? #Has the way you approach Tolkien's work changed over time? #Would you ever recommend Tolkien's work? Why/Why not? ==Tolkien Experience Podcast== Hosted by Luke Shelton, Sara Brown and Sarah Westvik. "The TEP is an attempt to bring the fan and scholarly communities together around our shared passion: the works of J.R.R. Tolkien! Each episode features a notable scholar or member of the fan community sharing their responses to the original Tolkien Experience Project questions".{{webcite|author=Luke Shelton|articleurl=https://luke-shelton.com/tolkienexperiencepodcast/|articlename=Tolkien Experience Podcast|website=[https://luke-shelton.com/ luke-shelton.com]|accessed=18 May 2023}} The guests are asked the same five questions from the Project, with an added sixth question: :6. What Tolkien work, project, or community are you currently working on that we should know about? In [[2021]], the podcast received [[the Tolkien Society Award]] for best online content.{{webcite|author=[[Shaun Gunner]]|articleurl=https://www.tolkiensociety.org/2021/04/winners-of-the-tolkien-society-awards-2021-announced/|articlename=Winners of The Tolkien Society Awards 2021 announced|website=TS|accessed=11 July 2023}} ===Episode list===
